and <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G1392><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> might glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> his mercy <S%G1656><s%>; as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Therefore1223, 5124 will I give praise <S%G1843><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> sing <S%G5567><s%> unto <S%G3686><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>.

I have <S%G2192><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> my glorifying <S%G2746><s%> in <S%G2746><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in <S%G2746><s%> things pertaining <S%G3588><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

yea <S%G1161><s%>, making it my aim <S%G5389><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> to preach the gospel <S%G2097><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was already named <S%G2443><s%>, that <S%G3361><s%> I might not build <S%G3618><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> another man <S%G245><s%>'s foundation <S%G2310><s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> no more <S%G3371><s%> any place <S%G5117><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G5125><s%> regions <S%G2824><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> these <S%G575><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> a longing <S%G1974><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>,

but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%>, I say <S%G4198><s%>, I go unto <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, ministering <S%G1247><s%> unto the saints <S%G40><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it hath been the good pleasure <S%G2106><s%> of Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Achaia <S%G882><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> a <S%G2842><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> contribution <S%G2842><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%> among the saints <S%G40><s%> that are <S%G3588><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> have been made partakers of <S%G2841><s%> their <S%G846><s%> spiritual things <S%G4152><s%>, they owe <S%G3784><s%> it to them also <S%G2532><s%> to minister <S%G3008><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> carnal things <S%G4559><s%>.

that <S%G2443><s%> I may be delivered <S%G4506><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them that are disobedient <S%G544><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> ministration <S%G1248><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> I have for <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> may be <S%G1096><s%> acceptable <S%G2144><s%> to the saints <S%G40><s%>;

that <S%G2443><s%> I may come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> together with <S%G4875><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> find rest <S%G4875><s%>.
